entry.title: Day 2 Check In
entry.content: We took a deeper dive into Chrome’s developer tools today - specifically using the network tab to troubleshoot AJAX calls. I feel like I’m moving slower than I’d hoped, however I realize there’s a mountain of knowledge ahead of me and to paraphrase Jack Kerouac, I gotta’ climb that mountain.

entry.title: Day 1 Check In
entry.content: Today was the first day of “code bootcamp” at Sabio and it was similar to the first day of class at most colleges - review the code of conduct, overview of the syllabus, and some warmup assignmens to assess where each of us are skillwise. The instructor explains things in a way that never makes you feel small and the classroom feels open and airy with one glass wall.
